headline: Is There Opportunity in Gartner After a 50% Drop in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Gartner is undervalued or if there is an opportunity ready for the taking? You are not alone, especially with so much debate around where the real fair value lies. The stock has seen quite a ride, dropping 5.1% this past week and sliding 7.5% over the past month, with a substantial year-to-date decline of 50.9%. Recent headlines have amplified investor curiosity as broader technology sector volatility and shifting market expectations have put pressure on research and consulting...
